{|
|-
|
|}
Firefox crash.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.write a large text in mediawiki
2.write tables tag

firefox crash

comments.raw_text:
The crash will happens in these conditions:
1) A mediawiki editor copy and paste text containing bullet lists and tables,
from ms-word to mediawiki via internet explorer.
2) A mediawiki editor, that use firefox 1.0.6-1.2 for Fedora Core 3 or 1.0.6-1.2
for Fedora Core 4 coming from the default installation rpms, edit the pasted
article using tables tags.
comments.creator: tombo@adamantio.net
